title: Flipped Learning-Based CPR (Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation) Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) procedures and AED usage
context.additional_context: A blended learning course combining VR simulations and team-based learning for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will perform CPR procedures for adults/children in a VR simulation environment with over 90% accuracy.
Learners will propose effective emergency role-assignment protocols within 10 minutes through Team-Based Learning (TBL).
Learners will master techniques meeting chest compression depth and rate standards (over 85%) using RQI (Resuscitation Quality Improvement) equipment.
Learners will demonstrate theoretical knowledge of CPR by scoring over 80 points on MCQ assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
